parameterDescriptions.parameterDescription: The string that will be used to connect to the database.

function.longDescription:
To connect to PostgreSQL you need to provide a connection string that contains all the required information. The format of the connection string is:
jdbc:postgresql:[//host[:port]/]database?user=myUserName&password=myPassWord
Example:
jdbc:postgresql://db-server:4743/myDatabase?user=myUserName&password=myPassWord&ssl=true
Read more at: [Database URLs and Database Specifiers](https://jdbc.postgresql.org/documentation/80/connect.html)
